title: I.O.T.U (I Only Think about U)
lyrics:
Lyric BONG JAE HYUN - I.O.T.U (I Only Think about U)

[Romanization]

The rain that fell yesterday
Drops of water on the windows
on the windows and sunny day

busisihan eolgul
tudeolgeorin pyojeong dwieneun
yodongchigo inneun nae moseup

neol bomyeon nae mameun dugeundaeneunde
dugeundaeneunde
eotteoge eotteoge haeya hae

But I think I’m still awkward in love
awkward in love

I’ve always liked you
you maybe hate me
duryeoun maeume idaero jinaeryeo haneunde

nae meori sogen hanaman tteoolla
you you you
I only think about U

you you
I only think about U

you you
I only think about U

eojjeoda handubeonssik majuchineun
jakku gwiyeoun neoui moseupdeureul

bolsurok deo joajineun geol
alsurok deo gipeojineun geol

Say what I want nan neoege
‘joahae’ra mareul haebogo sipeo

I really like you, think only one
maeummaneuroneun ne ape seoisseo

nan gyesok neoman bomyeon seolleneunde
seolleneunde
yongginae yongginaeya hae

But I don’t know what to do about it
what to do about it

I’ve always liked you
you maybe hate me
duryeoun maeume idaero jinaeryeo haneunde

nae meori sogen hanaman tteoolla
you you you
I only think about U

oneul harudo geunyang ireoge
heulleoga beoryeo ne saenggangman hadaga

neoege nan eonjejjeum
pyeonhage mal georeo bol su isseulkka

I’ve always liked you
you maybe hate me
duryeoume sumeoseo nochyeobeoril su eopseotgie

oneulmangkeumeun hambal deo dagaga
you you you
I only think about U

you you
I only think about U

you you
I only think about U

[Hangeul]

The rain that fell yesterday

Drops of water on the windows

on the windows and sunny day



부시시한 얼굴

투덜거린 표정 뒤에는

요동치고 있는 내 모습



널 보면 내 맘은 두근대는데

두근대는데

어떻게 어떻게 해야 해



But I think I’m still awkward in love

awkward in love



I’ve always liked you

you maybe hate me

두려운 마음에 이대로 지내려 하는데



내 머리 속엔 하나만 떠올라

you you you

I only think about U



you you

I only think about U



you you

I only think about U



어쩌다 한두번씩 마주치는

자꾸 귀여운 너의 모습들을



볼수록 더 좋아지는 걸

알수록 더 깊어지는 걸



Say what I want 난 너에게

‘좋아해’라 말을 해보고 싶어



I really like you, think only one

마음만으로는 네 앞에 서있어



난 계속 너만 보면 설레는데

설레는데

용기내 용기내야 해



But I don’t know what to do about it

what to do about it



I’ve always liked you

you maybe hate me

두려운 마음에 이대로 지내려 하는데



내 머리 속엔 하나만 떠올라

you you you

I only think about U



오늘 하루도 그냥 이렇게

흘러가 버려 네 생각만 하다가



너에게 난 언제쯤

편하게 말 걸어 볼 수 있을까



I’ve always liked you

you maybe hate me

두려움에 숨어서 놓쳐버릴 수 없었기에



오늘만큼은 한발 더 다가가

you you you

I only think about U



you you

I only think about U



you you

I only think about U
name: BONG JAE HYUN - I.O.T.U (I Only Think about U)
